mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_transaction ( order_id, order_no, user_id, pay_channel, amount, third_trade_no, status, remark ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{payChannel}, #{amount}, #{thirdTradeNo}, #{status}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_id, order_no, user_id, pay_channel, amount, third_trade_no, status, remark, created_time, updated_time FROM payment_transaction WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, order_id, order_no, user_id, pay_channel, amount, third_trade_no, status, remark, created_time, updated_time FROM payment_transaction WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY created_time ASC
SELECT id, order_id, order_no, user_id, pay_channel, amount, third_trade_no, status, remark, created_time, updated_time FROM payment_transaction WHERE third_trade_no = #{thirdTradeNo}
